name: Beer Tasting Journal & Notebook
description:
Beer’s important. Little Book of Beer helps you remember it. Beer geeks love drinking interesting brews and talking about them. Sadly, a lot gets forgotten. We created Little Book of Beer to help you remember beer, then share those memories. Little Book of Beer was field tested in the best beer bars. We showed it to the most opinionated beer geeks you’ll ever find, because we wanted it easy to use. Plus, sharing a tasting notebook at a bar is a clever conversation starter.

Only materials sourced from the U.S.A.:

Little Book of Beer humbly comes into print in the Pioneer Valley of Western Massachusetts, where real pioneers live(d). Pages: 32 pages (enough to note 15 of your favorite craft beers. Size: 3 1/2″ × 5 1/2" (fits in your pocket without jamming!). Cover: 120# Neenah Environment Paper. Environment papers are 100% post-consumer recycled and made with 100% renewable green energy. Insides: 70# Rolland Enviro 100 Bright White Opaque Text (100% post-consumer recycled). Rolland papers are processed chlorine free accredited & are manufactured using renewable biogas energy. Ink: vegetable based ink is used throughout. Available as:
  • Single copy
  • 3 pack
  • 3 x3 pack (9 books, free shipping!)
FREE Shipping on all orders more than $25! NOTE: as of February 2013 international shipping rates went through the roof. The USPS doubled international shipping rates, even to Canada. Sorry.

options.name: 3 x 3 pack (9 books, FREE shipping, U.S.A only!)

name: Bottle Caps Temporary Tattoos
description:
GUARANTEED HOLIDAY DELIVERY – order by Friday, December 20, 2pm EDT – you'll have your order by the 24th at the latest!

Is craft beer a priority? Damn straight! Let people know with this crafty design.

A fun gift for any craft beer geek (or soda, I guess!).

Size: 1.5" x 2.5"

• Safe & non-toxic
• Printed with veggie-based ink
• Made in the USA
• FDA-compliant colorants
• Application instructions on the back

These are shipped as a set of two. FREE shipping in the United States.

We also do wholesale and custom tattoo orders! For more info, get in touch using the contact page.

name: Gift Wrap & Handwritten Note
description:
Keep it simple by adding a gift wrapping option to your Little Book of Beer order. We'll wrap your books and/or tattoos, and include a brief handwritten message.

We'll send your gift directly – just enter your recipients address in the "Ship To" section during check out, and they'll have it within 2-3 business days (in the U.S.A.).

*When checking out, please include your message in the "Message to Seller" section. If you do not include any message we will ship the package wrapped but without a message.
